title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for Afrikan Reparations
purpose: To bring together parliamentarians, campaigners, communities, and other stakeholders to examine issues of African Reparations and the repatriation of art and cultural artefacts, as well as exploring policy proposals on reparations and development, and how best to redress the legacies of African enslavement and colonialism.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 0207 219 6695.
contact_details.secretariat: African Foundation for Development (AFFORD) acts as the group's secretariat. https://afford-uk.org/
